overview: Vaalu (English: Naughty) is an upcoming Tamil comedy film directed by debut director Vijay Chander. The film will feature Silambarasan and Hansika Motwani in lead roles.It has Ganesh and Brahmanandam in supporting roles. The film is produced by S. S. Chakravarthy and features background score and soundtrack composed by S. Thaman. Only few portions of the movie are left to be shot and the movie is expected to be released on Ajith's Birthday (May 1,2014) coinciding with Simbu's Birthday whereas Audio launch is announced to be held on Valentines Day 2014.
title: Vaalu
